item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first blog! This is my first blog test to see if everything works right and to test the setup Here is a list of programming languages: Python JavaScript Java C++ Ruby Feel free to explore and learn more about these languages! url is currently : http://localhost:1313/posts/my-first-post/
item.content:
This is my first blog!

This is my first blog test to see if everything works right and to test the setup

Here is a list of programming languages:

  • Python
  • JavaScript
  • Java
  • C++
  • Ruby

Feel free to explore and learn more about these languages!

url is currently : http://localhost:1313/posts/my-first-post/
